name: biceps-curl-squat-with-dumbbell
title: Biceps Curl: Squat with Dumbbell
primer: This exercise combines a squat with a curl to effectively work the entire body.
steps: This exercise combines a squat with a curl to effectively work the entire body. This is an advanced exercise.
Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, your knees slightly bent and your abs drawn in.
Grasp a dumbbell in each hand and curl your arms up to your shoulders.
Bending at the waist, squat down as you lower your hands to the floor (the lower part of a curl).
Pause for a moment and then return to the starting position.
Note: Contract your biceps as you curl your arms up.
